FILLER.Name: dbpath
FILLER.Desc: Data storing path

FILLER.Name: svcname
FILLER.Desc: Local service port

FILLER.Name: diaglevel
FILLER.Desc: Set the print level of diagnose log. In SequoiaDB, diagnose log is from 0~5 , and they stand for:SEVERE,ERROR,EVENT,WARNING,INFO,DEBUG

FILLER.Name: logfilesz
FILLER.Desc: Set log file size, legal input is 64~2048 (MB)

FILLER.Name: logfilenum
FILLER.Desc: Set sync log file number, legal input is 1~11800

FILLER.Name: transactionon
FILLER.Desc: Whether turn on Transaction

FILLER.Name: preferedinstance
FILLER.Desc: Set priory selecting instances when executing read request. M -- R/W instance； S -- Read Only Instance； A -- Any Instance； 1~7 -- n th instance

FILLER.Name: numpreload
FILLER.Desc: Page preload proxy data, default is 0, value range:[0,100]

FILLER.Name: maxprefpool
FILLER.WebName: Max number of data preloading proxy pool
FILLER.Desc: Max number of data preloading proxy pool, default is 200, value range:[0,1000]

FILLER.Name: maxreplsync
FILLER.Desc: Max concurrency of log syncronizing,default is 10, value range:[0,200], 0 stands for not using log concurrently syncronizing.

FILLER.Name: logbuffsize
FILLER.Desc: Replicate Log Buffer Page Number,default value:1024, value range:[512,1024000], but log buffer size can't exceed the total log file size, each page is 64 KB

FILLER.Name: sortbuf
FILLER.Desc: Sorting buffer size(MB), default value :256, min value:128

FILLER.Name: hjbuf
FILLER.Desc: Hash continuous buffer size（MB）,default value:128,min value:64

FILLER.Name: syncstrategy
FILLER.WebName: Data syncronizing strategy between replica groups
FILLER.Desc: Data syncronizing strategy between replica groups, Value:none,keepnormal,keepall, Default is:keepnormal

FILLER.Name: weight
FILLER.Desc: The weight of election, default value :10, value range:[1,100]

FILLER.Name: maxsyncjob
FILLER.Desc: The maximum number of data-sync threads, default:10, value range:[2, 200]

FILLER.Name: syncinterval
FILLER.Desc: The interval time(unit:ms) of data-sync, default:10000, 0 means disable data-sync by time

FILLER.Name: syncrecordnum
FILLER.WebName: the trigger condition of record number of data-sync
FILLER.Desc: The trigger condition of record number of data-sync, default:0, 0 means disable data-sync by record

FILLER.Name: syncdeep
FILLER.WebName: turn on deep mode in data-sync
FILLER.Desc: Turn on deep mode in data-sync, default:FALSE

FILLER.Name: archiveon
FILLER.Desc: Turn on replica log archive, default false

FILLER.Name: archivecompresson
FILLER.WebName: turn on replica log archive compression
FILLER.Desc: Turn on replica log archive compression, default true

FILLER.Name: archivepath
FILLER.Desc: Archive log file path

FILLER.Name: archivetimeout
FILLER.Desc: The timeout interval for archiving( in seconds ), default:600, 0 for no-timeout.

FILLER.Name: archiveexpired
FILLER.WebName: expired time for archive log file
FILLER.Desc: The expired time for archive log file ( in hours ), default:240, 0 for no-expired.

FILLER.Name: archivequota
FILLER.WebName: disk quota for archive log directory
FILLER.Desc: The disk quota for archive log directory ( in GB ), default:10, 0 for no limit.

FILLER.Name: indexpath
FILLER.Desc: Index storing path,Default is 'dbpath'

FILLER.Name: bkuppath
FILLER.Desc: Backup storing path, Default is 'dbpath/bakfile'

FILLER.Name: lobpath
FILLER.Desc: Lob data file storing path, Default is 'dbpath'

FILLER.Name: lobmetapath
FILLER.Desc: Lob meta file storing path, Default is 'dbpath'
